resources.string: *Warning*: This app may contain offensive language and jokes, you may continue at your own risk.
Before continuing, you need to agree to our terms of use:
1. I agree that I consent to view jokes/memes and I will not be offended.
2. In the case I do get offended by something, I agree that this was warned to me beforehand and hence I cannot take action against the developers.
3. I agree that I will enjoy the memes and jokes and will not take anything too seriously!
I agree to the terms of use as provided to me.
Please note: You cannot proceed unless you agree to our terms of use.
